messages.message: The middle bar is darker because I’ve clicked on it. I can click on other bars to select them and deselect the middle, but I can’t click anywhere that deselects all 3 bars. And when I use the download feature to get an image of the chart, the selected bar also appears darker in that image. That means that once I click on a chart region there will always be one darker bar in downloaded images of that chart

Ideally re-clicking on the same bar should do the job but I am assuming in your case this does not work. Can you confirm if this is happening consistently with bar graphs or is this the only one? You can share the file and prompt with me as well so that I can check the same.
Oh actually it does deselect on aihub-uat

Maybe I was looking at an old version or doing something wrong. I still think having the downloaded image be affected by whatever element is currently selected is strange, but that’s way less important if it’s controlled by user behavior
It might be useful in some cases such as when someone wants to remove a category all together and download the graph
